channel.title: Cache Loading, NWYT
channel.description:
EDIT: NVM. i believe PI alreadyhas this ;) where all objects are server sides haha.
NWYT-not what you think...
I need to know how the client loads the cache for the "default" object id's and locations. can anyone point me in the right direction? :o i post this in server help because i need it for what i want to make for my server. a worldObjectManger, and localObjectManager. --world toggles objects visible to everyone(ex. trees,ores,etc), local does for that person only(ex. farming) I need the file(or at least the method) that loads them:(

item.title: Cache Loading, NWYT
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

EDIT: NVM. i believe PI alreadyhas this where all objects are server sides haha.

NWYT-not what you think…

I need to know how the client loads the cache for the “default” object id’s and locations. can anyone point me in the right direction? :o i post this in server help because i need it for what i want to make for my server.
a worldObjectManger, and localObjectManager.
–world toggles objects visible to everyone(ex. trees,ores,etc), local does for that person only(ex. farming) I need the file(or at least the method) that loads them:(

Read full topic
